Elevation

The elevation helpers allow you to control relative depth, or distance, between two surfaces along the z-axis.

Variants

There's a total of 25 elevation levels. You can set an element's elevation by using the class is-elevate-N, where N is a integer between 0-24 corresponding to the desired elevation.

Playground

Elevation 0

is-elevate-0
